thread.title: Hot weather returns to Bay Area
thread.title_full: Hot weather returns to Bay Area - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Kale Williams
title: Hot weather returns to Bay Area
text:
Photo: Amy Osborne, The Chronicle In this file photo, the shoreline of Ocean Beach is filled with people enjoying the warm weather. The Bay Area will see a few warm days this week before a chance of rain moves in Wednesday and then again next weekend. In this file photo, the shoreline of Ocean Beach is filled with...
A warm start to the week is in store for Bay Area residents with San Francisco heating up to the low 80s on Monday and temperatures climbing even higher inland. In this file photo, the shoreline of Ocean Beach is filled with people enjoying the warm weather.
